Please, share your music : [mixtape.bit](/mixtape.bit)

post.body: Hello ZeroMe!
I am adding profile page on ZeroTube.
What people of ZeroMe think of [GitTorrent](http://blog.printf.net/articles/2015/05/29/announcing-gittorrent-a-decentralized-github/) ?
You can now delete video on ZeroTube.

Update on ZeroTube : 
* You can access people profile
* Fix the search (now search correctly in description)
* Can't upload duplicate video on your channel but different people can have the same video on their channel
I am still here. Cheers.

### ZeroTube Update 
You can now edit title and description of your videos.

I have fixed the router : [A Declaration of the Independence of Cyberspace by John Perry Barlow](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FUQPLXHimgCvYHH7v3bJXspJ7bMBUXcEb/?/watch/10/d59e6da0de8f5382f067e07375c262f15570a8f1)
Tonight I am going to try to create a ZeroNet website with the merger feature and I feel like it is going to be painfull. Wish me luck and see you on the other side.

Hello here,
I have done some update on the ZeroNet-React example (http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JfWHNDQeR71Uf8EtyRqCNJ1Ked5t1pukk/).
I just arrived in Koh Lanta. Anyone has been there before ?

I am thinking of splitting ZeroTube in channels. Each channel will be a hub and using merger site feature you would be able to follow/unfollow channel. It would work like ZeroMe. 

The advantage is that the database would be smaller (I know for now it is not a problem) and you could choose who would post in your channel. 

The issue is that the search feature would be less effective because you would not be able to search in channel that you don't follow. 

What people from zeronet thinks of it ?
Currently coding a torrent plugin for #zeronet at #ndhXV. Let's see what we will have in 10 hours.

I have made some nice progress on the Torrent plugin thingy, you can check the code here : https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-torrent-plugin

It is still an experimentation but so far it looks good. The plugin can be tested here once installed : http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL/

Just a reminder that you are not anonymous when using Torrent plugin.

## Good News Everyone

I have made some progress on the torrent plugin for ZeroNet. It now can stream videos/audio. I will publish the new example site soon.

There is still a lot to do though :
- Save and resume libtorrent session
- Torrent plugin UI
- Make it compatible with Webtorrent

The two first would be nice.

# News everyone

I published the updates of the torrent plugin. It now allows you to stream while downloading. Here the link to the github : https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-torrent-plugin

Link to the example site : http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL/

Link to the example site github : https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-torrent-plugin-example

Have fun,

Hey everyone !

I just want to share an old project that allow you to keep your private key for your site on your ledger nano S. Unfortunately, it is not complete but I am hoping someone would be interested in this project.

https://github.com/rllola/nanos-zeronet-app
Trying to build libtorrent python bindings with conan. I am not entirely sure it is worth it...

I just discovered that live coding music is a thing and that there is a festival in Sheffield this week end üòÑ

http://algomech.com/

Hello everyone,

I have been playing around with BigFileUpload and MergerSite features and had fun creating a playlist sharing site. I will soon release the code on gitcenter and a beta version of it (I wanted to do it a couple of days ago but realized that it wasn't working as expected...).

I am also testing a CI process with travis. As anyone done something similar before ? I would appreciate the help and I am also concerned on giving travis the private key to sign the site...

However, I hope people will like it...

Currently coding & drinking wine...

And I also realize that ZeroMe doesn't support adding several pictures in the same post.

But whatever, I present you Mixtape. I currently have a broken staging version of it that I would be more than happy to share with people who want to test...

Of course it comes with a pretty sick playlist of 2 songs of my personal music collection that I totally didn't stole on youtube.

Enjoy,

I started a new project a while ago call Mixtape. It is a sharing playlist site.

You can find it here [Mixtape.bit](/mixtape.bit)

If you have any bug you can report it here : https://github.com/rllola/mixtape

I have added a public playlist to [Mixtape](/mixtape.bit)

People should be able to add a song to the playlist if they have a zeroid.bit address.

If the song doesn't show you might want to rebuild/reload the database. For some reason that I don't understand the database is not always up to date after saving a new song...

I will next explain how you can create your own playlist and fix some bug...

Added the option to support a playlist by automatically downloading the songs on Mixtape.

Will be available on staging in a couple of minutes.
Spent sometime on the following button for Mixtape. I am wondering if I should make it a npm package or not for future use... (Ôø£„ÉºÔø£)

I have made it !
Beside the fact that I didn't use unix timestamp format in my db I found a way to convert it in my sql without using a coma because of parsing issue in Zeronet app. Yep it took me days.

I have added a song from Fakear in the private playlist. He is a french DJ. I really like what he does.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/mixtape.bit/?playlist/1FEyUA9W4jfSZRREgqHEUstQGhUeaNcRWG
Little thought for our lads from UK : "It isn't coming home".

Working on UI interface to easily create mixtape. Unfortunately it needs admin permission... 

It is a bit annoying to need it just to clone a site.

# Update on Mixtape

I have just update [Staging](/staging.mixtape.bit), people can now create new playlist. There is also a menu with an Edit button but it is not yet fully implemented.

Please let me know if you have any problems or feedback.

## Mixtape update

New version of [Mixtape](/mixtape.bit) released today. You can now create and edit your playlist easily. I added a menu so you can follow/support playlist from the home page.

Next task is going to make it easier to upload several songs at once. Many of you have requested it.

## Update Mixtape

I have updated mixtape. You can now see what are the permissions status on the playlist (only if you own the hub). After creating a playlist you will actually need to modify the permissions. For now you cannot do it from the UI you will need to go and modify the files manually but I ma working on it.

I have also added a "donation" section for people who would like to support the project. I am also going to start documenting my work as much as possible.

And last, I have added a playlist from a french music collective which I really like : La Fine Equipe. I highly recommend 'Charlotte au Chocolat' for good mood.

M.I.A - Born free

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/1KuwwnkAtVrfnyhv8pyGRxLqzNZbEkJt2u/1534606555-M-I-A-%20-%20Born%20Free.mp4

NSFW

My attempt of trying to get Zeronet-Kivy dev environment working has been a huge fail. I am not able to build the vagrant and the docker images is also failing. I also need a good android emulator because in my attempt of upgrading my android tablet to the latest version, I broke it... 

Anyone has been successfully able  get Zeronet-kivy working and could walked me through it ?
Liberty. Equality. Chicken.
I have joined mastodon : https://mastodon.social/@lola_dam

## Mixtape update

I fixed the url thingy. So now you can directly go to a playlist (if the hub is downloaded) :
http://127.0.0.1:43110/mixtape.bit/?playlist/1FEyUA9W4jfSZRREgqHEUstQGhUeaNcRWG

I found this article on incentives and Bittorent network : https://www.usenix.org/legacy/event/nsdi07/tech/piatek/piatek.pdf

I am still reading it but I went directly to the conclusion and it is quite surprising...
> BitTorrent works well today simply because most people use client software as-is without trying to cheat the system.
I just added La Boulangerie 2 (La Boulangerie hub) on Mixtape.
I don't care what people might say about him but goddamn Kanye West's 2 first albums (The College Dropout & Graduation) are damn good.

I have been doing some small works on Mixtape's hubs and added a new song for the week.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/mixtape.bit/?playlist/17rzU1715PbkyFjumb6SaH69cf1dgZqxxh

## Zeronet Torrent plugin

I have done some work to improve the build of libtorrent for the plugin and it should work on Linux and Mac OS. 

Please let me know if you are having trouble installing it :
https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-torrent-plugin

!! IMPORTANT : the plugin is using bittorrent protocol and not Zeronet so you are not going to be anonymous while using this plugin !!

You can test with one of those free torrents : https://webtorrent.io/free-torrents

Updated the test site for Zeronet (it was not properly detecting the plugins apparently).

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL/

##Zeronet Torrent plugin update

I am trying to make installation even more easier by shipping the plugin with libtorrent already build. So people don't have t build it because it is slow and heavy work.

However the difficulty would be to have the lib build for each platform (linux, osx, windows, android, arm,...). I can use travis and appveyor to automatize the build but it is going to be a pain. If anyone can help on this task it would be much appreciated.

## Zeronet Torrent plugin update

I am now able to build the libtorrent lib and distribute it to other platform (at least work on linux and should on Mac OS). So now you just need to download the plugin and done.

For windows it is still work in progress...

Here the test releases : https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-torrent-plugin/releases

First attempt to create a browser with PyQt5. Pretty easy and straight forward. 

I am now following an online course on PyQt5 to explore the possibilities.

Successfully building libtorrent on windows but the automatic build on appveyor is failing.
Getting there one step at the time.

## Zeronet Torrent plugin

Now I have the windows automatic build working (https://ci.appveyor.com/project/rllola/zeronet-torrent-plugin/builds/19376787). Next step is the deployment part.

## Zeronet Torrent plugin

First release !!
https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-torrent-plugin/releases/tag/v0.1.0
We are going somewhere...
Adding basic functionalities.

## Zeronet Browser Update : Windows build added

Here the 3 builds are available: https://github.com/rllola/ZeronetBrowser/releases/tag/v0.1.2

If you can test and let me know if works for you.
Working on tabs... Does it look like shit ? Yes it does.

Zeronet Browser

New release with new stuff.
https://github.com/rllola/ZeronetBrowser/releases/tag/v0.1.4

Music

I just added one of my favorite song : http://127.0.0.1:43110/mixtape.bit/?playlist/17rzU1715PbkyFjumb6SaH69cf1dgZqxxh

What the man say (translated) :
"This is the story of man falling from a building of 50 floors. He keeps telling himself : 'So far, everything is fine. So far, everything is fine.' But the important part is not the falling, it is the landing."

New version of the #ZeroNet browser poc. The release issues should be fixed (tested on Linux & Windows see screenshots). Feedback would be really appreciated. 

https://github.com/rllola/ZeronetBrowser/releases/tag/v0.1.5

[ ZeroNet Browser PoC ]

I have the linux version working and it can be linked to you already installed ZeroNet. It has an installed script. 

```
$ chmod +x install.sh
$ ./install.sh
```

https://github.com/rllola/ZeronetBrowser/releases/download/v0.1.8/build-linux.zip

OSX version is not working (and I don't have a mac).
Windows version might need some more work, especially an installer for easier use.
I just discovered the Kurzgesagt channel and I have been binge watching all the videos on it : https://www.youtube.com/user/Kurzgesagt

I am collaborating on an article in french for Framasoft. They ask me the question on the day to day base and forgetting the government/military censorship, what is ZeroNet useful for ? Any comments on it ?

**How sex censorship killed the internet we love** - Interesting article. I recommend it.

https://www.engadget.com/2019/01/31/sex-censorship-killed-internet-fosta-sesta/?fbclid=IwAR248R_PDtCCWuirpqnFQZrKRWS_sn3gGB9U8732BK1nKNdN6udcDbR4I2w&guccounter=1

Got the Windows blue screen of death on the ATM machine... How is it possible that those machine are running on windows ? Also it kept my credit card. I have money but no way of spending it. It feels so stupid.

So people liked the talk on Dark Data that @Klu9 posted. I thought I will also share this one by the same journalist : **Inside the Fake Science Factory** - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ras_VYgA77Q

I am sorry I couldn't upload it because it as more than 200MB if someone could upload them in 2 parts it would be cool.

## Torrent plugin

I have updated the torrent plugin using a newer version of Libtorrent. I had some issue with Linux but now it should be fix.

I have also updated the torrent example site : [1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL](/1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL/)

No windows for now because I was able to only build for 64bits but ZeroBundle is using python 32bits.
New design for Mixtape thumbnail with a menu a la ZeroMe

## Mixtape

I just released a new version with the new menu. I also uploaded [La Boulangerie 3, the third album of La Fine Equipe](/mixtape.bit/?playlist/1N5sPX9Wp5rPGwWdXwVDGV4d3wdhmwVyv8)

Connecting to Namecoin full node to resolve Zeronet address after re-writting the ZeronameLocal plugin for python3.

Does people use ZeronameLocal ?

Some programming books (python, linux & SQL)

[/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er/index.html?view:channel+id:1Mz1_1CKt2mJ6qoDx2YzuJLKr7d2uyLFSDkqfzm](/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er/index.html?view:channel+id:1Mz1_1CKt2mJ6qoDx2YzuJLKr7d2uyLFSDkqfzm)
I have been watching The Orville and damn this show is good.

[Amy Shark - Teenage Dirtbag cover](/mixtape.bit/?playlist/17rzU1715PbkyFjumb6SaH69cf1dgZqxxh)

Old school classic

New release of the experimental browser with now installers.

https://github.com/rllola/ZeronetBrowser/releases/tag/v0.2.3
@leftside Here a screenshot of the browser

## News

The py3 branch of ZeroNet has the new ZeronameLocal plugin. It can connect to Namecoin full node and Namecoin electrum SPV node. It is an alternative to the Zeroname plugin which allows you to locally resolve .bit domain.

Enjoy,

I have watched the new Twilight Zone TV show and I am quite disappointed by it. They poorly treat their subjects but they are in my opinions quite interesting ones. Maybe my favorite one is the one in the plane... but the others...meh.

I started to watch Legion and damn it is a good TV show. It is a X-men serie but with a really particular take on mental health and an amazing scenario.

Bonus point : Aubrey Plaza play in the serie and she is an extraordinary actress.
You can now edit permission on [mixtape.bit](/mixtape.bit)
I did some minors fix on mixtape and also changed the background of the player (I couldn't see it anymore). I am working on some couple ideas on the player.
I have been listening to The Guilty Feminist podcast and find it pretty funny.
I have listened the lastest episode of The Guilty Feminist and it was hilarious. I will upload it on ZeroNet for peeps to enjoy it.

The first time I saw Mona Chalabi, it was in The Fix show (which I recommend it is hilarious). She also has an instagram account with a bunch of graphics and stats : https://www.instagram.com/monachalabi/

Really interesting work. Definitely go and have a look.

I have watched "Desi Lydic : Abroad" piece and it is hilarious but also really informative. There is a lot to take from it. In particular, that in order to reduce the pay gap, one of the biggest fight is to have parental leave and not only maternity leave.

Maybe we should start to talk about it more.
I am impressed by people patient and dedication in answering the newcomers on ZeroTalk.
Did anyone else got the irony of welcoming this wave of digital white supremacist emigrants?

I finally was able to build the demo android app of the pyqtdeploy project and I am now trying to revive my android tablet by flashing it and... It seems to be working.

 I am going to test it and try to build the browser for android.

## Torrent Plugin update

I just updated the site to add the Torrent Plugin for python 3.

You can check it [here](/1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL/)

It is still a pretty shitty plugin and it doesn't use Tor.

I have finally permentally switch to py3 version of ZeroNet and I am using the browser... It is a bit terrible but I start to get used to it.

I am now coming back to my work on the torrent plugin and mixtape.
That Ricky Gervais speech at the Golden Globes was savage. I have to say I love british humor.
I have discovered r/unixporn and this all I wanted ever. Who want to share his recipe ? I have customizing mine but it is still pretty heavy... I want minimalist stuff.

Humble Bundle on cybersecurity. Gonna get it :
https://www.humblebundle.com/books/cybersecurity-2020-wiley-books
My ISP has blocked ETZV website...

Anyone heard of Netsukuku before ?

Quite interesting project.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netsukuku#A_Netsukuku_Domain_Name_Architecture
What did I miss ?

Airbnb Camera Scanner v0.1.0

A small project that show devices on the network and the company that manufacture them. Helpful to verify if you don't have a camera spying on you in rented place (which is unfortunaltely a current practice).

https://github.com/rllola/airbnb-scanner/releases/tag/v0.1.0

I just finished the 8th season of Letterkenny. I didn't get most of the jokes probably because I am not Canadian (I did get the jokes about Celine Dion tho). However that soundtrack and some of the scenes are fucking legendary.
Well... It has been a minute.

I have updated the Torrent plugin and Torrent plugin site.

[/1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL](/1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL)

It now support BitTorrent v2. Careful using it because it will not make you anonymous even if you use ZeroNet with Tor.

This plugin allow you download files from the Torrent network.

More features will come.

##  Zeronet Torrent plugin v0.4.8

I have fixed the issues regarding the installation and size of the plugin. Also added permissions requirement for site to use the plugin. It is still a PoC. If this goes well it could be use as a bridge between Bittorrent and ZeroNet and fun to play with.

See [/1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL](/1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL)

# Electrum NMC plugin

Here the install site for the Electrum NMC plugin : http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BD92Qo8p2UnLfkdNeex9CgtYsn2LNAFnN/

This plugin allow to resolve .bit domain name without using the Zeroname site (so in a decentralized old fashion). It doesn't download the all block chain but only interesting tx by following the SPV protocol. IT desktop friendly.

This finally an old issue : https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/407

Nothing more has to be done after installing the plugin. It just work out of the box. You can `disabled` the `Zeroname` plugin.

Feedbacks are welcome.

-------
It is something that I wanted to get done for a while now. I am pretty happy with the result.

comment.body: I don't know what is it... ?
@Megfault: The same thing that a simple goat but with headphones.
@Thekiller66: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FUQPLXHimgCvYHH7v3bJXspJ7bMBUXcEb
@Kaffie: Yes, probably.
Hello Justgo.
@Kaffie: I have send you an email if you want we can keep talking on ZeroMail.
Dark ZeroMe ?
Hola
@Jayofthezero: Nice.
Also if you have issue uploading videos you can create an issue on the github or you can message me on ZeroMail.
Hello

@Sirenyc:  

>Video with .mkv extension does not handle the zerotube?
I don't know I never tried. 

>the side of the watch button could have an icon of the magnet link
That can be easily done.

>You can put the ZeroMe link in the profile Zerotube?
I will add a full description on the profile so it would be easy to add a link to your ZeroMe profile.

>Is there any way to put the caption option in the video? =D
So far I am only planning subtitles.
@Sirenyc: I have added a warning on the form. I will try to add a verification of the extension on the upload to avoid it. And sorry I did not get your second question...
@Truth: Thanks. Trying to improve it every day.
Email is linked to a gmail one. You should maybe change it for ZeroMail one. Example : `http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=lola`
Is it qute tho ?

Hi again @Nishita,
On the bottom of your post there is the disqus plugin which is not compatible with ZeroNet. In order to add comments you need to code your own integration.
@Nishita: Yes, I think it is a good example.
@Nofish: Thank you
I have actually been really lazy and have done almost nothing.

@ku4rt4m: It is a really simple example of a react application on ZeroNet. Might help some people to get started using their favourite framework. It has been also my first attempt to create a single application page using react.
@Arsene Lupin: https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-react Yep Sorry I was hoping to have time to write a better documentation before publishing it.
Welcome back ?

@Shellbound: The searchable index would be a good solution, it could probably be a new project. I will think about it.

And I am glad you like it. Still need to dig into webtorrent to understand how I can know when there is no peer so it would load more videos in the node automatically and the videos would keep showing. I have half a solution so far...
@Bingyuhuo: Should be ok now. I didn't have zeronet running so you couldn't download.

@Kaffie: Good point ;) I need to find someone with a OSX otherwise I think I will be able to handle linux/windows. Also it would be nice to have a plugins store @Nofish has mentioned it in the past but I am not sure for when it is planned ?

@P2P: I believe I can use conan to ship libtorrent dependency with it with the plugin and it will install it regardless of the OS you are using. I am not entirely sure how it works though. But I will try to make it a priority for this week so people can test the example.

@Synapse: There is a specific language for it : https://tidalcycles.org/
I think I will test it this week end.
@caryoscelus: Thanks a lot. It look pretty cool.
@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: I has been deployed but there is a quite annoying bug. I can still send you the link by email if you to test. I will just ask you to not share it yet.
@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: Done ;)
@Binchan: Sweet. Thank you. I will try next time.
@Nomad42: It looks neat. Thank you.

@Jetten: I will add it on the site. I am trying to understand what it is doing that. Also remember there is *private* hubs and *public* one. If you don't have the permission to write it can show on your local computer but it will not be distributed. The new release of Zeronet has improved the `fileRules` command I should be able to tell in a less hacky way if you have permission or not.
@Wanditoast: Really ? Is it a blank page or just no peers found ?
@Wanditoast: Yes you need to reload the page with F5. You might also need to reload the db. I've just discovered there is an error. Trying to fix it today.
@Wanditoast: It should be fixed now. In case it doesn't work you might still need to rebuild/reload the db using the right panel.

@Eibriel: Hi Eibriel, Yes the hubs under **Public Hubs** are just a link to download the hub (using mergerSite feature : http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:87:Upcoming+feature:+Merger+sites)

So there is nothing wrong it should then appears in **My Hubs**

@Eibriel: To create a new empty Hub (or playlist) there is not easy way with an interface for now but you can clone on of the hub and tweak it a little to add your playlist name, description and permissions. I can walk you through it if you want.
@Eibriel: Yes exactly ! That's what you need to clone. You should be it able to clone from the home page.
@Eibriel: In **data/users/content.json** replace "lola@zeroid.bit" by your zeroid. You will then need to sign and publish it. And it should be good. Do you know how to sign and publish ?
@Eibriel: Sweet ! If you want to share your playlist I can put it on the home page (I will need your address).

@Eibriel: When I open **data/15k39oW3xh8WCrG2mvgC53EcQisHLAqnox*** I don't see a **data/users** folder... You might need to sign also the content.json file which is inside so it will be share. You need to sign and publish both **content.json** file. It should work after that.
@ZAlex: I have also read that it is ok in Russia to beat your wife. You will only get a fine but no jail time. Is it true ?
@ZAlex:  "‚ÄúDomestic violence has ... breached the principle of equality of citizens [in the family],‚Äù" <-- what that does even mean ? That's bad.
@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: Even "My hubs".... Yeah the url thingy doesn't seem to work for me neither...

@Piloth: It should add a new hubs under "My hubs". I should rename it "playlist" really. It is because you need to download the hub. I am using merger site feature. This is the only way I found to do it. However if I fix the url thingy I should be able to give a redirection link which should help.
@‰πå‰∫ë: It is a reference to a song : Three Lions - Football's Coming Home. Unfortunately yesterday UK lost in semi-final against Croatia.

@Glightstar: Yes. On the hub I have `cloneable : true` which allow me to clone this particular hub. However to be able to do it from Mixtape I need to have `admin` permission because it is going to create a site for the user. I am using this api : http://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/site_development/zeroframe_api_reference/#siteclone-address-root_inner_path
I kept the link for the tutorial in case people don't want to update the permission with a small message.

@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: After clicking create mixtape it redirect you to your hub. You should go back to Mixtape and you will be able to a new playlist call `myMixtape` it is your private one. You can add song from this one.
@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: And if you want to share it you need to give address to someone so this person can download the hub and access your songs.
@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: I guess I can work on that yes. Didn't know it was possible. Thank you for the info.

@Fyverymuch: You need to come back to the site and find the playlist on `My Hubs`. Because of the way Zeronet work you need to first to visit the hub in order to download the hub and be able to use it in the site.
@Fyverymuch: Yes this is something I will work on soon. I am trying to finish first with the hub/playlist creation. I should start work on it then.
@Underd0g: Sorry :( Could you tell me what you see ? Is it a blank page or you cannot find peers ?

@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: "Create a Mixtape" create a new gub for you by cloning a default one (which Mixtape). Zeronet will immediately redirect you through this one (nothing that we can do about it). It is your 'playlist' don't delete it. 

After creating it you can come back on the main site and you will see a new playlist call "myMixtape" it is yours. You should be able to edit the title and the description using the small 3 dots menu next to the name...

What you tried to do is publishing in "Mixpate public" which is a public playlist where everyone can publish any songs. I can see it (I ma currently listening to it). However this playlist is manage by me.

And yes I know about the loading animation which doesn't properly show. I am going to work on it. And remove the 'Nope' button. It was just me testing stuff.

@Klu9: "The above two points mean you don't have to make compromises like letting Facebook or Google own your ID and your content, track you everywhere and exploit data about you." Thanks people for your contribution ! Here I want to share my thoughts on this.

Some of you mentioned that because you don't have a central server, we are not tracking user and collecting data. It is I believe an important point that I think we can take further. Relying on selling data users for profit also have a big impact on design and user experience. The UX is being developed as a way to generate users data and doesn't contribute in creating a quality UX. I would even argue that it has created toxicity (even enhance hate ?...). Metrics used to build UX never consider the quality of the exchanges.

Another point might be the necessity for privacy. Tor is already a good solution on its own for this. A recent post kind of strike me, it was a father mentioning that his daughter has drug problem (of course it was posted by Anonymous). Researching on google information for it would make them aware of this and this is frightening that big companies has those kind of information on minors. My believe is that privacy is needed to build fully grown and functional human being.

"Privacy is the ability of an individual or group to seclude themselves, or information about themselves, and thereby express themselves selectively." Sometime you need this and I think Zeronet also serve this purpose.

Does it make sense for people here what I wrote ?

@Zboy: The browser won't do that but the new ZeronameLocal plugin does it! It works with full node and electrum-nmc through rpc (see [https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/pull/1985](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/pull/1985) ). I am preparing a post to explain a little bit more.
@klu9@zeroid.bit: Do you have anything in the console ? You might need to rebuild the database (sometimes I have to do it for unknown reasons).
@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: It is disabled by default so unless you enable it wont change anything.

When enable, it will attempt to connect to your Namecoin node (full or SPV). It will fail to connect if not rpc configuration has been added to the `zeronet.conf`. It just won't resolve the .bit if it can't connect. I am preparing an article explaining the modification for future reference.
